Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.common.GeoCoordinate

  • Packages that use GeoCoordinate 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.common
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations that are generally used by other packages in the Android SDK.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping
    The mapping package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that display an interactive map, and related functionality that allows your application to create and add map content.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing
    This package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations for route calculation and route description (directions).
    com.here.android.mpa.search
    The search package provides classes for performing places and geocoder searches.

      Calculates the distance (using the Haversine formula), as measured in meters, between this GeoCoordinate and the specified GeoCoordinate.

      Returns heading from this point to the given coordinate in degrees.

      void Map.setCenter(GeoCoordinate point, Map.Animation animation, double level, float orientation, float tilt)
      Moves the center of this Map to a specific GeoCoordinate, while simultaneously setting a zoom level (a fraction within the range of minimum and maximum levels), orientation (from 0 degrees to 360 degrees), and tilt (within the range of minimum and maximum tilt angles).
      MapMarker MapMarker.setCoordinate(GeoCoordinate coordinate)
